languages.text: Короткие электромагнитные импульсы этой бомбы выводят из строя электросети и приборы. Ее мощности хватит, чтобы обесточить район города или несколько отсеков пустотного корабля.

traits.locale_text: Короткие электромагнитные импульсы этой бомбы выводят из строя электросети и приборы. Ее мощности хватит, чтобы обесточить район города или цнесколько отсеков пустотного корабля.

languages.text: This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is strong enough to take out the power of a whole city district or several voidship sections.
languages.original_text: Короткие электромагнитные импульсы этой бомбы выводят из строя электросети и приборы. Ее мощности хватит, чтобы обесточить район города или несколько отсеков пустотного корабля.

traits.locale_text: This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is potent enough to de-energize a city district or several voidship modules.
This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is potent enough to de-energize a city district or several voidship modules.
This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is strong enough to take out the power of a whole city district or several voidship compartments.
This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is strong enough to take out the power of a whole city district or several voidship compartments.
This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is strong enough to take out the power of a whole city district or several voidship sections.
This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is strong enough to take out the power of a whole city district or several voidship sections.

languages.text: この爆弾は短い電磁パルスを発生させ、電力網や機器を無力化するもののようだ。市街地全体やヴォイドシップの複数の区画の電力を奪えるほどに強力だ。
languages.original_text: This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is strong enough to take out the power of a whole city district or several voidship sections.

traits.locale_text: この爆弾は短い電磁パルスを発生させ、電力網や機器を無力化するもののようだ。市街地全体やヴォイドシップの複数の区画の電力を奪えるほどに強力だ。

languages.text: 这种炸弹会产生短电磁脉冲，使电网与机械设备瘫痪。它的威力足以让整个市区陷入黑暗，或切断几支虚空舰舰队的电力。
languages.original_text: This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is strong enough to take out the power of a whole city district or several voidship sections.

traits.locale_text: 这种炸弹会产生短电磁脉冲，使电网与机械设备瘫痪。它的威力足以让整个市区陷入黑暗，或切断几支虚空舰舰队的电力。

languages.text: Cette bombe génère des impulsions électromagnétiques qui neutralisent les réseaux et autres appareils électriques. Elle est suffisamment puissante pour couper le courant de tout un quartier ou de plusieurs sections d'un même vaisseau.
languages.original_text: This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is strong enough to take out the power of a whole city district or several voidship sections.

traits.locale_text: Cette bombe génère des impulsions électromagnétiques qui neutralisent les réseaux et autres appareils électriques. Elle est suffisamment puissante pour couper le courant de tout un quartier ou de plusieurs sections d'un même vaisseau.

languages.text: Esta bomba produce breves pulsos electromagnéticos que desactivan redes y dispositivos de energía. Sería capaz de dejar a oscuras un distrito entero o varias secciones de una nave del vacío.
languages.original_text: This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is strong enough to take out the power of a whole city district or several voidship sections.

traits.locale_text: Esta bomba produce breves pulsos electromagnéticos que desactivan redes y dispositivos de energía. Sería capaz de dejar a oscuras un distrito entero o varias secciones de una nave del vacío.

languages.text: Diese Bombe produziert kurze elektromagnetische Impulse, die Stromnetze und Geräte deaktivieren. Sie ist stark genug, um ein ganzes Stadtviertel oder mehrere Sektionen eines Raumschiffs auszuschalten.
languages.original_text: This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is strong enough to take out the power of a whole city district or several voidship sections.

traits.locale_text: Diese Bombe produziert kurze elektromagnetische Impulse, die Stromnetze und Geräte deaktivieren. Sie ist stark genug, um ein ganzes Stadtviertel oder mehrere Sektionen eines Raumschiffs auszuschalten.

languages.text: Bomba, güç şebekelerini ve aygıtları devre dışı bırakan, kısa elektromanyetik dalgalar üretiyor. Şehrin bir bölgesinin tamamının veya birden fazla uçsuz gemisi bölümünün gücünü kesebilecek kadar güçlü.
languages.original_text: This bomb produces short electromagnetic pulses that disable power grids and devices. It is strong enough to take out the power of a whole city district or several voidship sections.

traits.locale_text: Bomba, güç şebekelerini ve aygıtları devre dışı bırakan, kısa elektromanyetik dalgalar üretiyor. Şehrin bir bölgesinin tamamının veya birden fazla uçsuz gemisi bölümünün gücünü kesebilecek kadar güçlü.
